title: Starting A Team Silver-Gold (SERIOUS PLAYERS ONLY)
body:
Hello guys, I am_** Xate Infinity**_, and I have decided to make my own team for Silver-Gold rank. Some things about myself. I am 15 years old and I have dream of becoming a professional league player (I know i'm only Silver). I live in Arizona and and creating a team to grow and improve has a team. Practice times will be based off when the whole team can make it and I am very strict about the practice times (Yes I understand if you miss a few). As of now, I am in MST (Mountain Standard Time). It would be a bonus if you guys have a similar time zone or about 1 hour off, as it would be hard if any higher. As of now we don't have any roles filled (Except ADC). 

Roles: (TBD = To be Determined)

Top:** TBD**
Jungle: **TDB**
Mid: **TBD**
Support: **TDB**
ADC:** Xate Infinity**


Here is an application I want you guys to fill out

**Role:
Rank:
Top 5 Champs in Role:
3 Champs I want to improve on
Season 5 Rank:
Why aren't you higher?
Strength:
Weakness:
Are you Willing to make Most practices:
Time Zone:
Voice Comms:
Do you Work?:
When are you available?:**




Alrighty guys that's pretty much it, Ill add you on League or message you on here if I have nay further questions

replies.body: Bump

Role: Fill but my best roles as of right now is Jungle{{summoner:11}} , ADC{{summoner:7}} , and Support!{{summoner:3}} 

Rank:Silver 3 right now! **BUT **since I've noticed my mistakes i'm becoming a way better player!

Top 5 Champs in Role:{{summoner:11}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:64}} 
                                       {{summoner:3}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:201}} 
                                       {{summoner:7}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:51}} 
                                                               **THESE ARE IN ORDER FROM WHO IM BEST WITH TO WHO IM OK WITH**

3 Champs I want to improve on: Lee Sin, Caitlin, Thresh

Season 5 Rank:Bronze 2

Why aren't you higher?I used to blame my teamates for why I do so bad. I've learned it's easier to cooperate and understand that everyone and especially 
myself has room for improvement.

Strength: Like a "Safe-Aggressive" I change my play style to the teams needs. I also understand the fact that its not always the teams fault and I have room to improve.

Weakness: Instantly pissed if someone does the missing ping if I make a bad play. Occasionally will make dumb plays.

Are you Willing to make Most practices: Possibly! Need to know the schedule.

Time Zone:Pacific

Voice Comms: skype, razer comms, teamspeak, curse, discord

Do you Work?: Nope! Full Time Schooling

When are you available?: Almost Anytime when i'm not in school




_BY THE WAY: I DO NOT HAVE A BAD COMPUTER, AND I DO NOT HAVE HORRIBLE INTERNET!_

Do you Work?:No
When are you available?: Mon-Friday 4-12 Saturday 12-12 (Basically a lot when im not at school)

I too have a dream of becoming a pro NA LCS player, and will do my best to become one. I am sacrificing time and resources to achieve this goal, I just need a team that wants it just as bad as I do.
